info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 8:33PM EDT until June 26 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Mecklenburg County in south central Virginia... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 833 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Buffalo Springs, or 9 miles south of Redoak, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Clarksville around 845 PM EDT. Chase City and Boydton around 915 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Fairview, Rogers Corner, Spanish Grove, Finchley, Skipwith and John H Kerr Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
